Question: Scosche Industries Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Scosche Industries Inc.

BaseLynx 2.0 Modular Charging System

- Qi2-certified magnetic wireless charging stand
- Interchangeable modules: Qi2 Wireless Charging Stand, Multi-Device Vertical Charger, Apple Watch Magnetic Charger, Powered EndCap with 67W USB-C port and 120V AC outlet
- Available in white with MagSafe exclusively at Apple.com and select Apple stores

MagicMount Elite Charge 3-in-1

- MagSafe Compatible wireless charging phone mounts
- Compatible with MagSafe iPhone models and non-MagSafe iPhone and Android models
- Includes MagicRing Adapter for compatibility
- Available Spring 2024

PowerVolt wall chargers

- Features GaN technology for safe, cool, and efficient charging
- Made from 75% certified post-consumer recycled plastics
- Folding prongs for travel convenience

PowerVolt 40W dual USB-C port car adapter

- Sleek design
- Convenient in-vehicle charging

StrikeLine Charge and Sync cables

- Includes USB4 High-Performance cable and StrikeLine Cobra magnetic cable
- Cobra's braided jacket integrates magnets for organization and phone mount function
Summary_cn:
斯科仕工业公司

BaseLynx 2.0模块化充电系统

- Qi2认证磁性无线充电支架
- 可互换模块：Qi2无线充电支架，多设备垂直充电器，Apple Watch磁性充电器，带67W USB-C端口和120V交流插座的供电端盖
- 仅在Apple.com和部分Apple店铺提供白色款MagSafe

MagicMount Elite Charge 3合1

- 兼容MagSafe的无线充电手机支架
- 兼容MagSafe的iPhone型号以及非MagSafe的iPhone和安卓型号
- 包含MagicRing适配器以实现兼容性
- 2024年春季推出

PowerVolt壁挂式充电器

- 采用GaN技术，安全、低温、高效充电
- 采用75%认证的消费后塑料制造
- 可折叠插针，便于携带旅行

PowerVolt 40W双USB-C接口车载适配器

- 时尚设计
- 便捷车载充电

StrikeLine充电和同步数据线

- 包括USB4高性能数据线和StrikeLine Cobra磁性数据线
- Cobra的编织外套集成了用于整理和手机支架功能的磁铁
